text: The Superior Court of the District of Columbia shall consist of a chief judge and 61 associate judges.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 11-903.

1973 Ed., § 11-903.

Effect of Amendments

Pub. Law 110-201 substituted "61" for "fifty-eight".

DC CODE § 11-903

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Organization and Jurisdiction of the Courts. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Superior Court of the District of Columbia. (Refs & Annos)
